name: Social Distance Puzzles
description:
A puzzle game inspired by "tents and trees" and social distance.

In Social Distance Puzzles, place people into different groups and keep social distance! Numbers around the grid tell you about how many people should be placed in a row or column. Each puzzle has only one solution, which can be solved by logic.

For more puzzles, please download my game on Google Play. Thank you for playing.

Come and talk about games: @blue_outta
